nodes.documentation: @title Stores and provides gas price minimum for various currencies.
nodes.name: GasPriceMinimum

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct FixidityLib.Fraction memory,struct FixidityLib.Fraction memory) pure returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set a multiplier that impacts how quickly gas price minimum is adjusted.
@dev Value is expected to be < 1.
nodes.name: setAdjustmentSpeed

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct FixidityLib.Fraction memory,struct FixidityLib.Fraction memory) pure returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the block density targeted by the gas price minimum algorithm.
@dev Value is expected to be < 1.
nodes.name: setTargetDensity
getGasPriceMinimum
updateGasPriceMinimum

nodes.name: getUpdatedGasPriceMinimum

params.tokenAddress: The currency the gas price should be in (defaults to gold).

getGasPriceMinimum(address).return: current gas price minimum in the requested currency

getUpdatedGasPriceMinimum(uint256,uint25.details: Calculate using the following formula: oldGasPriceMinimum * (1 + (adjustmentSpeed * (blockDensity - targetDensity))) + 1.

params.blockGasLimit: The maxBlockGasLimit of the past block.
params.blockGasTotal: The amount of gas in the most recent block.

getUpdatedGasPriceMinimum(uint256,uint25.return: result of the calculation (new gas price minimum)

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params.blockGasLimit: The maxBlockGasLimit of the past block.
params.blockGasTotal: The amount of gas in the most recent block.

updateGasPriceMinimum(uint256,uint256).return: result of the calculation (new gas price minimum)

devdoc.title: Stores and provides gas price minimum for various currencies.

getGasPriceMinimum(address).notice: Retrieve the current gas price minimum for a currency.

getUpdatedGasPriceMinimum(uint256,uint25.notice: Calculates the gas price minimum based on governable parameters and block congestion.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAdjustmentSpeed(uint256).notice: Set a multiplier that impacts how quickly gas price minimum is adjusted.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setTargetDensity(uint256).notice: Set the block density targeted by the gas price minimum algorithm.

updateGasPriceMinimum(uint256,uint256).notice: Adjust the gas price minimum based on governable parameters and block congestion.
